While I was thrilled that Kaede had proposed to me,\nI was a little disappointed that I hadn't got the\nchance to do it myself.%K%P
It threw all my plans into disarray, but it also\nmeant I could move on to the next step of my plan.%K%P
\dThere ya are, Akira.\d%K%P
The townsfolk were already gathered by the time I\narrived.%K%P
\dSorry for the wait. Took me a while to slip away.\d%K%P
\dBah, don't sweat it. Bet it weren't easy sneakin'\noff.\d%K%P
\dSpoken like a man with experience.\d%K%P
Everyone laughed at that one.%K%P
Once everyone had chatted a bit and settled down,\nwe moved on to our main topic.%K%P
\dSo, the reason I've gathered you all here is of\ncourse about helping me throw a wedding.\d%K%P
\dA wedding?! Wow, you sure move fast.\d%K%P
\dBut Kaede doesn't actually know anything about\nthis yet.\d%K%P
I told them all how she had proposed to me, and how\nI wanted to surprise her with a wedding next.%K%P
\dSo that's why you wanted to gather us up all\nsecret-like, then.\d%K%P
\dI only planned to propose at first, but she beat\nme to the punch.\d%K%P
\dTechnically it doesn't matter which of us\nproposed, but there's a deeper meaning behind it.\d%K%P
\dI feel like a man really has to play his part in\nthis right, or else he's no real man.\d%K%P
\dBut I absolutely cannot pull this off without your\nhelp. So please, if you would...\d%K%P
I bowed in sincerity and awaited their response.%K%P
\dNo need for all that, up with you now.\d%K%P
I came out of the bow to see everyone smiling back\nat me.%K%P
\dWe all owe you lots.\d%K%P
\dWith the festival, with Kaede, you've helped us\nout through plenty.\d%K%P
\dWe want you two to be happy. So of course we'll\nhelp ya.\d%K%P
Whether everyone agreed or not, no one spoke a word\notherwise. They all nodded along.%K%P
So many people were willing to help.%K%P
It was enough to make anyone happy.%K%P
\dGot any ideas yet?\d%K%P
\dYes. First of all...\d%K%P
And so we all worked behind the scenes to put\ntogether a wedding that Kaede wouldn't catch on to.%K%P
Once everyone was on board, things moved pretty\nquickly.%K%P
It started with just our shrine regulars at first,\nbut eventually spread to include almost the entire\ntown.%K%P
Everything was going well, save for one particular\ndetail.%K%P
\dWhat am I going to do about the ring?\d%K%P
Shinto weddings didn't require a ring exchange.%K%P
But if we were going to be married, I wanted a ring\nas proof of our commitment.%K%P
\dHow am I going to figure out her size?\d%K%P
I asked about the town for a way to sneakily work\nout Kaede's ring size.%K%P
They suggested things like using string or just\nworking it into a normal conversation somehow, but\nit all seemed too tough.%K%P
Kaede was quick-witted and would catch on for sure.%K%P
While I sat trying to come up with some other way\nthe three girls came barging in.%K%P
\dAh, there you are. We've been looking all over.\d%K%P
\dFor me?\d%K%P
\dNow we can finally get our measurements!\d%K%P
What measurements?%K%P
I sat confused as Shion handed me a measuring tape.%K%P
\dDid you forget already? You said you would buy us\nall rings.\d%K%P
\dOh yeah...\d%K%P
I suppose I had.%K%P
I'd been so focused on Kaede that it slipped my\nmind.%K%P
\dI almost didn't believe it when they told me. What\nwonderful news!\d%K%P
\dIt seems like you and Kaede have worked things\nout, so we're good to go now, right?\d%K%P
\dI can't wait any longer! Get measuring!\d%K%P
Yukari stuck out her hand and the others followed\nsuit.%K%P
What a lifesaver.%K%P
\dLet's see here...\d%K%P
I quickly got all their measurements.%K%P
And just like that all my worries were wiped away.%K%P
Now I just had to keep things under wraps until the\nbig day.%K%P
Not a cloud to be seen in the blue sky above. It\nwas the perfect day for a wedding.%K%P
People were filing into the shrine grounds before\nit started.%K%P
It was obvious something was up. Kaede stood\nwondering.%K%P
\dWow, look at all these people.\d%K%P
\dIs there something going on today?\d%K%P
\dThat's strange, today shouldn't be anything\nspecial. Any idea what this is about, Akira?\d%K%P
\dThere's a wedding ceremony today.\d%K%P
\dReally? I know they do occasionally hold those at\nKamimori Shrine, but I'm certain there was nothing\non the schedule for today.\d%K%P
\dHow can they have a ceremony if even Kaede doesn't\nknow about it?\d%K%P
\dIt's a wedding between Kaede and me.\d%K%P
\dWhat?\d%K%P
They all looked at one another.%K%P
I did just drop piping-hot news on them, I guess.%K%P
\dWhat do you mean, our wedding--\d%K%P
\dWhat is the meaning of this?! A wedding? For\nKaede?!\d%K%P
\dWhat's the big idea, Aki? Explain yourself!\d%K%P
\dI'll explain it all later. Just bear with me.\d%K%P
\dWha-- Akira wait! What is going on...?\d%K%P
The girls from town pulled the confused Goddesses\naway.%K%P
Yukari and Shion were brought to the audience, and\nKaede was taken away to change.%K%P
\dGuess I better get dressed.\d%K%P
We didn't have a lot of time to spare. I had to\nhurry.%K%P
\dYou really pulled one over on me, Akira.\d%K%P
We were dressed in traditional garb, with Kaede all\nin white.%K%P
She glared with reproachful eyes.%K%P
\dI had actually been planning to propose all along,\nbut you beat me to it, so I needed to do\nsomething.\d%K%P
\dAnd that 'something' was a wedding, was it? That's\nso like you, Akira.\d%K%P
\dIs this too much?\d%K%P
\dOf course not. I'm so happy that I feel terrible\nfor Yukari and Shion.\d%K%P
\dI'll hold a wedding for everyone eventually. But I\nwanted to do this with you first.\d%K%P
With the ritual words spoken and the nuptial cups\nexchanged, we made our oaths.%K%P
I read my vows out in front of all the people\ngathered there.%K%P
\dOn this very happy day we gather here at Kamimori\nShrine to celebrate our wedding.\d%K%P
\dFrom here on Kaede and I promise to trust and\ncherish one another, and support each other in our\nlife together.\d%K%P
\dWe ask for your good wishes as we take this next\nstep.\d%K%P
With that said the priest brought us our rings.%K%P
\dKaede.\d%K%P
Ring in hand I spoke deep from the heart.%K%P
\dI return these words back to you.\d%K%P
\dI swear that I will fall in love with you time and\ntime again. Tomorrow more than today, and the next\nday more than that. I will always love you.\d%K%P
I placed the ring on her finger and the crowd broke\ninto applause.%K%P
\dMay we be happy together.\d%K%P
\dOf course!\d%K%P
